entry.title: Frictionless Data June 2022 Community Call

entry.title: Frictionless Data May 2022 Community Call
entry.summary: At our Frictionless Data community call we heard about citizen science and climate change solutions using Frictionless Data

entry.title: Workshop on FAIR and Frictionless Workflows for Tabular Data
entry.summary: On 28 and 29 April 4TU.ResearchData and the Frictionless Data team joined forces to organize an online workshop on “FAIR and frictionless workflows for tabular data”

entry.title: Frictionless Data April 2022 Virtual Hangout
entry.summary: At our Frictionless Data community call we had a discussion around open science best practices and the Turing Way with former Frictionless Fellow Anne Lee Steele...

entry.title: Frictionless Data March 2022 Virtual Hangout
entry.summary: At our Frictionless Data community call we had a discussion with Johan Richer from Multi.coop around his theory of portal vs catalogue.

entry.title: Combining Data Skills, Knowledge, and Networks to Save our Planet
entry.summary: To start this year fresh and inspired, we convened two gatherings of climate researchers, activists, and organisations to brainstorm ways to collaborate to make open climate data more usable, accessible, and impactful...
